thread.title: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned
thread.title_full: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned

author: ROB HARRIS and JAMEY KEATEN
title: Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned
text:
Dominic Steinmann Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned 
Outgoing FIFA President Sepp Blatter sits in the back of a car as he leaves the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct 8, 2015, after he was provisionally banned for 90 days by FIFA ethics committee. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) Dominic Steinmann With Platini suspended, FIFA election field more uncertain 
Sepp Blatter sits in the back of a car as he leaves the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct 8, 2015, after he was provisionally banned for 90 days by FIFA ethics committee. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) Walter Bieri Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned 
FILE - In this May 29, 2015 file photo FIFA President Sepp Blatter, left, UEFA President Michel Platini, center, and FIFA Secretary General Jerome Valcke, right, are engaged in conversation during the 65th FIFA Congress held at the Hallenstadion in Zurich, Switzerland. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter, UEFA President Michel Platini and the former secretary general Valcke for 90 days. (Walter Bieri/Keystone via AP) Christophe Ena Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned 
FILE - In this Friday, Dec. 19, 2014 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter and FIFA secretary general Jerome Valcke, left, leave after a press conference in Marrakech, Morocco. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and the former secretary general Valcke for 90 days. (AP Photo/Christophe Ena, File) Christophe Ena Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned 
FILE - In this Dec. 16, 2014 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter, right, and UEFA president Michel Platini talk before the semi final soccer match between Real Madrid and Cruz Azul at the Club World Cup soccer tournament in Marrakech, Morocco. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days. (AP Photo/Christophe Ena, file) Dominic Steinmann With Platini suspended, FIFA election field more uncertain 
The FIFA logo is pictured at the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) Dominic Steinmann Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned 
Asian tourists photograph the FIFA logo at the FIFA headquarter in Zuerich, Switzerland, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days. (Dominic Steinmann/Keystone via AP) Posted: Thursday, October 8, 2015 4:51 pm | Updated: 8:00 pm, Thu Oct 8, 2015. Blatter suspended as FIFA president; Platini also banned Associated Press | 
ZURICH (AP) â€” Sepp Blatter is out of a job at FIFA. Michel Platini might never even get there. 
Two of the most powerful men in soccer were handed 90-day suspensions by the FIFA ethics committee on Thursday, essentially ending Blatter's 17-year reign as president and likely stunting Platini's chances of replacing him.
